trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关的部件的信息<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>指定坐标处。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The HitTestInfo class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]HitTestInfo 类，结合<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>方法<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>用于确定的哪个部分<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>用户已单击。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HitTestInfo class contains the location and associated designer that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: HitTestInfo 类包含的位置和被单击的关联设计器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The location on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 上关联的位置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>的被单击。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>与关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The AssociatedDesigner property stores a reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: AssociatedDesigner 属性存储的引用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>与关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>对象。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to reference extended information about the designer associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>引用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>关联的设计器的扩展的信息</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>与关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the area hit.
trans-unit.target: 返回点击区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: The bounds will describe the area on the screen that was hit, usually the area that encloses the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 边界在屏幕命中，而通常包含关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>区域上用于描述区域

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object or an empty rectangle if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object is not associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: 包含矩形<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>与关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>对象或为空矩形如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>对象并不与设计器关联。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about where the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关发生了点击的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the HitLocation to determine on what area of the designer the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HitLocation 来确定在设计器的哪一区域上发生了点击。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"></xref> that describes the area hit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations"> </xref>描述点击区域。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the hit designer.
trans-unit.target: 返回命中的设计器的索引。

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned by MapToIndex to determine which designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MapToIndex 返回的值来确定点击的设计器。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for insertion or deletion operations.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于插入或删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer hit by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 通过点击的设计器的索引<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取空<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use `Nowhere` to get an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Nowhere`可获取空<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: 获取与点击区域关联的可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: Use `SelectableObject` to get the selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: 使用`SelectableObject`若要获取与点击区域关联的可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: If a designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, SelectableObject will return the activity associated with the designer, or null reference (`Nothing`) if no designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果设计器关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>，SelectableObject 将返回与设计器，则为 null 引用关联的活动 (`Nothing`) 没有设计器是否与<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>关联</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: A selectable object associated with the hit area or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no designer is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与点击的区域或为空引用关联的可选择对象 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果未使用设计与<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的用户数据<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use UserData to store user information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: UserData 用于存储有关<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>的用户信息

trans-unit.source: If no user data has been stored, calling UserData creates a new, empty dictionary for use.
trans-unit.target: 如果已不存储任何用户数据，将调用 UserData 创建新的空字典以供使用。

trans-unit.source: A new dictionary for user data, or a reference to the existing user data.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的字典的用户数据或对现有的用户数据的引用。
